name: Trova
description: One of the most ancient expressions of Cuban Music, based around lone Singer-Songwriters who use nothing but a guitar as their preferred accompaniment and place emphasis on lyrics.

children.name: Nueva trova
children.description: Found inspiration in the 1950s Cuban Revolution and had the intention of introducing new musical ideas to the original Trova.
